Package org.omnifaces.cdi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PushContext
    CDI interface to send a message object to a push socket channel.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeanStorage
    CDI bean storage.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ContextParam
    The CDI annotation ContextParam allows you to inject a web.xml context parameter from the current application in a CDI managed bean.
    Cookie
    The CDI annotation Cookie allows you to inject a HTTP request cookie value from the current JSF context in a CDI managed bean.
    Eager
    The CDI annotation Eager specifies that a scoped bean is to be eagerly instantiated.
    Param
    The CDI annotation Param allows you to inject, convert and validate a HTTP request parameter in a CDI managed bean.
    Startup
    Stereo type that designates a bean as an eagerly instantiated bean with application scope.
    ViewScoped
    The CDI view scope annotation, with more optimal handling of bean destroy as compared to standard JSF one.
